Class Binary

  • java.lang.Object
    • Binary

  • public class Binary
extends java.lang.Object
    This is an implementation of a Binary class which is used for decimal and hexadecimal conversion.
    Version:
    2.0 - February 4, 2016
    Author:
    Chris Banci

    • Constructor Detail

      • Binary

        public Binary(java.io.PrintWriter pw)
        This is the default constructor for Binary. PrintWriter object is passed through this constructor for file writing. Class variables are also initialized to default values;
        Parameters:
        pw - is passed.

    • Method Detail

      • Reset

        private void Reset()
        This method re-initializes class variables for next use.

      • binToDec

        public void binToDec()
        This method converts binary to decimal using three methods.

        First method gets input from user, second method does the conversions, and last method outputs result. After conversion result is printed out, class variables are reset for next use.

        This method is called when user chooses binary to decimal option from menu.

      • binToHex

        public void binToHex()
        This method converts binary to hexadecimal using three methods.

        First method gets input from user, second method does the conversions, and last method outputs result. After conversion result is printed out, class variables are reset for next use.

        This method is called when user chooses binary to hexadecimal option from menu.

      • inputBin

        private void inputBin()
        This method receives input from user and is validated with boolean and if statements. Input is not valid when it does not contain binary numbers or is longer than 32-bits.

      • toDec

        private void toDec()
        This method is where the binary to decimal conversion calculations takes place.

        Algorithm:

        Reading from right to left, each binary digit is multiplied by 2 to the power of binary digits location starting from 0.

      • toHex

        private void toHex()
        This method is where the binary to hexadecimal conversion calculations takes place. This method directly converts from binary to hex using mapping.

        Algorithm:

        Reading from right to left, each binary digit in a nibble is multiplied by 2 to the power of binary digits location starting from 0. The decimal for each nibble is then converted to its hex equivalent.

      • outDec

        private void outDec()
        This method outputs the binary input and decimal conversion result.

      • outHex

        private void outHex()
        This method outputs the binary input and hexadecimal conversion result.
